name: Multi-Use Pure Oil Blend
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is:A multiuse, non-greasy, and lightweight oil blend consisting of high-end oils and no fillers; it softens, nourishes, and seals moisture into hair and body..Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Concerns:- Shine.Key Benefits:- Softens and nourishes dry, brittle hair.Highlighted Ingredients:- Baobab Oil: Penetrates to soothe dry, irritated scalp and condition dry, damaged hair..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:This grease-less oil blend penetrates into the hair and skin to soften, nourish, rebuild, and lock in moisture. Itu2019s made with high-quality baobab seed, argan, avocado, sweet almond, jojoba, sage, geranium, and vitamin E to restore and improve the manageability of the hair..Fragrance Description:Soft floral and bright citrus notes.
ingredients: -Baobab Oil: Penetrates to soothe dry, irritated scalp and condition dry, damaged hair..-Argan Oil: Antioxidant that protects and strengthens for cell regeneration and growth..-Sage Oil: Antibacterial, antimicrobial, antioxidant; conditions and stimulates growth...Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil, Geranium Maculatum Oil, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.As a moisture sealant: .-Massage a small amount into wet or damp hair to help seal the moisture in your strands or after your favorite styling cream to help seal and set your style...As a moisturizer: .-Add to your conditioner to help nourish, soften, and detangle...As a hot oil treatment: .-Add desired amount to small heat-safe bowl. .-Place small heat-safe bowl into larger bowl with a bit of warm water to help gently warm oil blend...As a body moisturizer: .-Massage into wet or damp skin immediately after bathing...Recycling Instructions:.-Rinse, remove bottle caps, and place in your recycling bin.

reviews.review_text: I HATE to have to give this 3 stars because I absolutely adore this oil. My most recent bottle (purchased within the last 2 weeks) has the most horrible, intense, cloying almost lychee-esque scent. I understand this may work for some, but as I have super sensitive skin and am really particular about fragrance, it simply doesnu2019t work for me. Iu2019m incredibly disappointed because when I first started using the oil, the scent was absolutely beautiful and very light. Even when the scent changed a bit with the 3rd bottle it was different, yet still pleasant. The oil is so nourishing so my heart actually hurts when I go to use it and recoil at the scent. The formula is so good for my scalp and curls, I really wish they would go back to the original, lowkey, fragrance.
